title: Predicting Policy Preferences from Party Manifestos with BERT and Convolutional Neural Networks
description: In this post, we present a deep learning approach to classifying labeled texts and phrases in party manifestos, using the coding scheme and documents from Manifesto Project.

title: Welcome to Hertie Data Science Lab Student Projects
description:
Welcome to our new blog, Hertie Data Science Lab Student Projects. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
